name: quantumcasaba
text:
Imagining that Chucklebot sounds like Stephen Hawking (see one of the first archives of the party, I forget who said it) really made this character for me and I'm kind of sad that he's never come back.
The serious lines delivered by an eternal grin really crack me up.
